Message.Msg: There is nothing partisan about this. Petraeus is a fine general. Petraeus was appointed by Bush to lead the surge and turn around the situation in Iraq--which he did. He later served as head of the CIA and lead the Afghanistan mission under Obama. He has served his country in the toughest situations where ever and whenever he was called upon to do so. Whatever his personal failings, he is twice the man and twice the American than a hack like you could ever dream to be. Partisans like you have no place in America.

Republicans lost the election because they have one constituency: old people, particularly old white people. Old white people tend to vote in higher numbers than every other constituency. So in interim elections, and in gerrymandered House districts, they can win. But in statewide or national elections, with the turnout associated with Presidential elections, they lose. Republicans lost the swing states by wide margins. There is no reason to think this will change if Republicans themselves do not change. The story of this election is demographics, but not the one playing out in the media. It is all about younger people--the boomer echo--reaching voting age and voting at higher rates than their predecessors. Just as the boomers altered the political landscape in the 70's and 80's, their children are altering it now. Their political views are very different than their parents. And their political influence will continue to increase. Your children are taking over, as they should. They will shape the country to their liking, not yours. This change may be very confusing to a generation that has had undue political influence since the 60's. But there is no dark force acting here, no foreign puppetmaster rigging elections. It is simply nature + democracy. You're getting old. That's it.
If he did how in H did GWB get in? De Nile is a river in Egypt. Get over it GOPERS, or your party is dead.
The GOP has numerous in their tent.
You believe de nile is a river IN Egypt. I have a bridge to sell you if you believe your posts.

They have the older, the. anti Muslim, anti different, anti abortion, anti birth control, and the thing denial is a river in Egypt. Oh, left out the birthers. Oh, then the one that believe everything on Fox News. Fair and Balanced. Would you buy a used car from a lot the said only honest deals.

Those are fine words about a fine man, but why are they coming from you Ricky? What happened to all the Democratic hate speech about Petraeus when he was the General in Iraq? What happened to the General Betrayus and all the other things you democrats called him when he was in charge of Iraq under Bush? Then he became your go-to guy in Afghanistan when the General there stepped down, most likely because of obama. He's stepping down because he wants to, not because of any affair.
Some counties in Ohio and Florida had a 140% turnout for America's illegal immigrant president.

Congratulations to the Democrats and Young People (that voted for Obama)! You now own it. The next terrorist attack, you own it. Can't get a job after graduation, you own it. Sky rocketing energy prices due to Obama's EPA shutting down the energy producing states, you own it. A nuclear Iran, you own it. Bowing to the Soviet Union, you own it. Another severe recession, you own it. A volatile border with Mexico, you own it. Trouble getting good health care, you own it. Higher heath insurance costs and health care costs, you own it. No budget, you own it. Our allies mistrust, you own it. Another few trillion of debt, you own it. More Benghazi situations, you own it. No one willing to join the military, you own it. Trouble getting a loan to buy a home, you own it. More dependency on food stamps, you own it. Trouble finding good employment, you own it. Several part time jobs instead of a good job, you own it. A World Government, you own it. The UN governing the United States instead of ourselves, you own it. A Senate that will not bring any legislation to the table rather it is "Dead on Arrival", you own it. China controlling our world trade and trampling all over us, you own it. Loss of our freedoms as we have known them in the past, you own it. A dictatorship instead of a democracy that follows the Constiution, you own it. Less take home pay and higher living costs, you own it. Driving a car that looks like a toy, you own it. More government corruption and lies, you own it. More toleration of extreme and fanatical Islamists, you own it. Terrorist attacks called work place incidents, you own it. Revenge instead of love of country, you own it. Have a good day.

Message.Title: Lunch experience today
Message.Msg: Went to lunch today to my favorite BBQ place Honeybears. Pulled in the parking and noticed no signs of life. Closed! Well I guess I'll just go to Fuddruckers although I don't want a Hamburger. Pulled in the parking lot. Closed. So I went to Boston Market. After Boston Market I thought an Ice Cream would sound good! So I went around the corner to Baskin Robbins. Closed. Oh well! Guess this is the shape of things to come. These closures are all in the past week.
And what is your point---that greasy spoons are closing?

My point is this. THIS ECONOMY IS COLLAPSING! You drive all over my city and there are very few small businesses that are open. Everything's closed! The 3 big strip malls by my house have only 12 businesses still open. Metrocenter which is a HUGE retail mall is just about dead (hundreds of businesses, gone). The only reason the stock market is up is because the Feds dump 40 billion into it every month. I haven't put a new dime into it in 10 years! OK ellerbebli2, go ahead now, Call me an idiot. That's what you do best.

You have not put any money in the market in 10 years? Interesting that was during W's administration, huh. And the feds dump 40 billion into the market every month. Really? How do they do that? You are right. You're an idiot.
Rump Ranger!

Message.Title: T losing customers in the north east
Message.Msg: Here in the northeast because of the storm Sandy T customers were really mad about no service. Verizon stayed on and no one was able to use cell phone if they were T customers. Everyone is switching to Verizon who can..

Message.Title: Dividend Increase
Message.Msg: When was the dividend increased from $1.76 to $1.80?? My check for the 4th quarter was the usual $0.44 per share. Answer please.

The increase is starts next quarter. I think the record date is January 10, 2013. The pay date is February 1st from the sources I see. You can check the historical prices section and search for divendends only to see the history.
It was announced a week or so ago. Applies to the 4th Q payable 2/1.
"Petraeus was appointed by Bush " I hope this isn't a blame Bush thing!
It comes down to tax payers and tax takers. The tax takers won.

winholder writes, "...the record surrounding Libya cannot be released due to national security issues." Let's hope John Boehner doesn't roll over and ignore Obama's many examples of failure to uphold The USA Constitution. Boehner needs to begin challenging Obama and set the tone for impeachment.
" I look for her to work perhaps at the U.N." Ohh, no !!!! That's where all the international communists work to make treaties that usurp The USA Constitution !
